fields.name: musicCompositionForm
fields.title: musicCompositionForm
fields.description: The type of composition (e.g. overture, sonata, symphony, etc.).

fields.name: includedComposition
fields.title: includedComposition
fields.description: Smaller compositions included in this work (e.g. a movement in a symphony).

fields.name: lyricist
fields.title: lyricist
fields.description: The person who wrote the words.

fields.name: recordedAs
fields.title: recordedAs
fields.description: An audio recording of the work.

fields.name: firstPerformance
fields.title: firstPerformance
fields.description: The date and place the work was first performed.

fields.name: musicArrangement
fields.title: musicArrangement
fields.description: An arrangement derived from the composition.

fields.name: iswcCode
fields.title: iswcCode
fields.description: The International Standard Musical Work Code for the composition.

fields.name: composer
fields.title: composer
fields.description: The person or organization who wrote a composition, or who is the composer of a work performed at some event.

fields.name: musicalKey
fields.title: musicalKey
fields.description: The key, mode, or scale this composition uses.
